original_text: He also that had received two talents came and said, Lord, thou deliveredst unto me two talents: behold, I have gained two other talents beside them.
korean_text: 두 달란트 받았던 자도 와서 이르되 주인이여 내게 두 달란트를 주셨는데 보소서 내가 또 두 달란트를 남겼나이다

sentences.original_text: He also that had received two talents came
thou deliveredst unto me two talents
I have gained two other talents beside them
sentences.korean_translation: 그것 외에 두 달란트를 더 얻었습니다
